Reviews.Title: Fraud
Reviews.Author: Malenay2k
Reviews.Content: I have been deceived since I bought a NEW iphone and they sent me a USED, BROKEN & with missing parts device. Since I live in Argentina I had the phone sent to a friends house in Miami and when she came to Argentina she brought me the iphone. I was surprised when I found out that the cable USB/charger was broken. However, I used the one from my IPAD that perfectly fits. After a week, the battery stopped charging, so I took it to a Mac store in my country.  I was told that the iphone was not new device (it was refurbished) and further, had missing parts inside. Unfortunately the 30 days return time has elapsed. Therefore, it is impossible for me to contact the seller and claim for the restitution of my money.

After two weeks I got it and everything worked perfectly, i'm from venezuela , so yes, it's fully unlocked and running with Movistar :D. i'm More than happy. sorry my bad englishAntes de comprar por acá en amazon intente hacer la compra directamente a apple por su página pero no sé porque no pude, vi este articulo y no estaba seguro si comprarlo porque no lo provee amazon directamente sino un vendedor externo, aún asi decidí arriesgarme y lo compre a "UnlockedFones". Luego de dos semanas lo recibi y todo funcionó perfectamente, cabe destacar que soy Venezuela, así que si está completamente desbloqueado y funcionando con Movistar :D. Más que feliz

Also, when my sister got it, she can use it with local carrier without any problem. Therefore, it's definitely unlocked. But the problem is it's black not white though the picture is white.Notice: You can buy this phone from apple website only with 650$.

Reviews.Content: Why in the world would I buy this, when the Apple store sells it for so much less?  The list price at Apple is $649.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Tico
Reviews.Content: I refused for years to get an iphone but after living through several other brands, finally decided to give it a try. Awesome, best ever. Why not a five? I ordered it black and came in white, which I hated, BUT I not sending it back. Waited to long for it.Charging calbe is very short though and the battery life is very short, not used to having to carry around the charger.

Reviews.Title: This cost me a lot of time and money and was not worth the apparent saving
Reviews.Author: Mr. J. M. Davies
Reviews.Content: I will restrict my opinion of this transaction to "very disappointed". Here is the correspondence about the purchase and you can make up your own mind about the seller.Buyer - I ordered the iPhone 4S as a present for my wife's birthday. The day she opened the present, she found that the ringer button does not function at all. The phone is always in the ringer mode and cannot be silenced. The only work around is to turn the volume completely down each time she goes into a quiet building. We have compared the settings with another iPhone 4 and found that it is indeed the function of the ringer button that is not working.Seller - I am so sorry about this issue.  We can have you refunded to repair the item at a local repair shop of yours or we can refund you in full with a return of the item.  For now she can also turn the ringer off by going to settings, then to sounds, and dragging the volume all the way down.  Once again I am so sorry for this issue and we will take are of it 100 percent until you are satisfied.Buyer - My wife attempted to have the phone repaired yesterday at an Apple Store. They were not able to repair the faulty ringer switch. They checked the phone history and found that it had been originally sold in October 2011 and had been registered to someone else. It had been purchased in Kansas from an Apple Store.I am extremely disappointed to find this out when the item description on the Amazon website described the phone as "Condition: New".I expect a full refund for this purchase. I also expect an explanation of why an item described as "Condition: New" is in fact second hand.Seller - I am so sorry about this entire situation.  We purchased the phone from a customer and they had informed us it was new.  We looked the phone over and from what we could tell the accessories and phone was new.  That is why we sold it as new. I am not sure if they had just gotten it in 2011 and not used it or what happened exactly.  We buy these phones from customers that come to us wanting to sell their iphones.  I am so sorry and we did not mean to mislead you in anyway.  We will have you refunded in full if you will return the product or can have you refunded to the used price of an Iphone 4s.  Please let me know which one you prefer.

There's no receipt in the package.I know iPhone 4s and iPhone 4 look similar to each other, but I think I can still figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Product wrong description...
Reviews.Author: Leoncio
Reviews.Content: I am staying outside the USA for a while so I ordered this phone via internet to get it while I have been in West Palm Beach, FL between March 21-31. As described in Amazon the phone was supposed to be <<Apple IPhone 4S 16GB White - Unlocked>> but when I left USA and tried to used the phone, I found out that it is NOT unlocked, NOT a 4S but a 4, and NOT a 16GB but an 8GB. Despite these differences, I decided to try to unlock it here in two different shops as I needed that phone for my business here. The phone kept asking for "last 2 digit of a Social Security Number" and "a Zip Code" which I could not get or figure out; I notified the seller of these steps I took but I was told that it was <<very odd>>. After a while I thought that it would be better to return the phone via UPS to the seller and I did (at a cost of $72.00 after converting from the local money). The seller was nice and understanding  and agreed to refund the cost of the phone back but I though that after all the trouble and misleading on this phone advertising, I would be nice and appropriate if the seller would have paid at least part of the returning cost.I would like an anwer from Amazon and the seller on this issue because I have been a long time customer and I never ever had any situation like this one before.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Wireless Closet for perfect phone
Reviews.Author: Sam Chung
Reviews.Content: The iphone 4S came in a factory box and includes the genuine phone, genuine recharger and ear buds.  As advertised the 4S performs exceptionally well with the highest output demand games like Asphalt 8 and plays music superb quality.  I was pondering whether I should buy a used condition phone, but I am glad I paid the extra to buy a new phone, because this obviously is a brand new phone.  Exceptional.. Superb.  Works perfectly with the new IOS 7 upgrade.  For those of you who are thinking whether to spend 700 to 800 dollars on the new 5S, the 4S is still very competent device that handles the new IOS with ease.  Love it..Love it.!

This phone was not unlocked as advertised bottom line. Apparently this is not an isolated incident. I was lookin for a case for the phone and read a bunch of reviews about fakes being sold on Amazon. I can say they sent me a shipping label and refunded my money promptly but other than that, I was highly disappointed. Amazon! If you really read your reviews and care about your customers please address the quality of sellers you allow on your site. And what's with the $20 increase for prime? Step it up Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Do NOT purchase anything from this store!
Reviews.Author: Carolina
Reviews.Content: They sold me a defective product and wouldn't  give me a reasonable answer to my claims. The phone came with the panic.plist error, a hardware problem, which means it can not be solved by restoring the Iphone but by replacing the defective part. That costs half the price of the phone. The battery won't get fully charged and it runs out of power pretty quick. The phone was out of warranty for more than 100 days as apple support let me know through live chat, which means I have to pay 200 bucks plus to get my phone fixed.If they list the product as brand new DO NOT believe in this! They sell used, defective items as they were brand new. If you want an unlocked Iphone get it from the apple website directly, and if out of the US, buy it from some other store. They're scammers.So if you don't want your money to be "decently" stolen or to be cheated DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM UNLOCKED FONES

Reviews.Title: Tampered, illegal, Jailbreaked.
Reviews.Author: Mary Faherty
Reviews.Content: Tampered, JailBroke, illegal activity, locked, very disappointing.The phone arrived locked with a pass code and Apple tried three times to bypass the code and failed, I had to Apple Specialist Techinal Support to bypass which cost eighty dollars and also the iPhone arrived without a charger or adapter which costed me 65 dollars, and then finally when I took it to a phone carrier they informed the iPhone was not unlocked, but it was locked, lord help me, so I called back Apple and they told me to go into settings and give them the serial number and then told me they were so sorry to have to tell me the iPhone was tampered with illegally, and Jailbroked. And that the iPhone was locked and not what I purchased so they could not unlock it and to bring it to AT@T and I did. At@T to.d me they could not bring it to a recommended phone store they know and let them unlock it for 60 dollars which I did because it was a Christmas gift for my daughter, at this point I payed 205 doors out of my pocket, Amazon told me when I reported what was going on, just to hold onto the iPhone for now to they tell me what to do with it that was three weeks ago and my daughter still has no pho e, but Amazon did give me a refund. I think I will just bring it to my local police station. tahnkyou Mary.

I wonder, how a refurbished phone could be with a defective wifi AND a non working speaker? I wonder if this phone was refurbished at all and if it should even be on the market. Probably somebody that works on Apple manage to sell this phone without fixing it or somebody got a replacement and sold the defective phone.-when I returned the item I had to pay for shipping that cost me around $20-after returning it, the seller tried to bribe me, offering $2 for every star I rated here, for a total of $10

Reviews.Title: Problems with Battery and earpiece
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my wife and got it delivered to a friends house so he could bring it to me as I am overseas. As soon as I got it, I noticed that the charger didn't work. Took it to apple authorized service centre in Brazil, and they informed the charger was not na original item. Then I started to notice that the battery life was very short. Then there was the issue with the earpiece. The sound quality of the calls were very poor, crackling noise and the sound had no body, such as if the call was coming from the inside of a can, very low and sharp metal like sound.In summary I think I paid over the top for handset that underperformed overall. I am dissapointed. I contacted the retailer, who informed that if I shipped it back to them, they would fix the earpiece issue and then return it. This would mean I would be without a phone for many days, which these days isn't good enough.I can understand that they can repair it and then return, but I think that is not good enough. I think they should fully test their merchadise before shipping, to avoid any issues with their customers. This may be na isolated incidente, but perhaps not. Reviews.Title: Overheated and burnt my hand
Reviews.Author: NSH
Reviews.Content: This phone was by far the worst phone I've had since the iphone 3G i had. Nothing but problems so far, overheating, super short battery life and a screen that looks way to dated to be on a phone for 2012. I was also expecting a far better camera with Apple's claim of being the best camera on a phone, but found that while it is a step up from the iphone 4, its not as good as what the Galaxy S2 or the HTC Amaze offers. While there are many many features that are obviously copied from Android, Apple somehow made the drop down bar, being my favorite feature in Android, annoying and bothersome to use!!! I am very glad however that iTunes is no longer required to anchor the phone down. Everything from the Screen to the battery life truly disappoints. On top of being an over-promised product, Apple has refused to help support it even though its only 21 days old!!! The closest Apple store is a 250 mile round-trip. If i would've just gone with the GS2 as I had wanted to, i wouldve been able to go to Sprint and had them take care of all my issues.I truly don't recommend this phone unless you absolutely cannot live without an Apple product or live within a decent range of an Apple store, other than that, I'm finding my friend's ATT GS2 far above the 4S in almost every way and will be getting rid of my 4S to get one as soon as i can.

Reviews.Title: Very good product and excellent service!
Reviews.Author: Z. Abussaud
Reviews.Content: I bought my iPhone 4S 16GB from Amazon.com and had it ship-forwarded to my country. Unfortunately, the mobile operators in my country do not support FaceTime and sell a local iPhone 4S version without the application; some local retailers sell iPhone 4S with FaceTime and charge significantly high, but I managed to save money by purchasing it from Amazon.com plus the ship-forwarding. Even if the mobile operator does not support FaceTime, I can still use it with Apple ID and free of charge through Wi-Fi. I am also very pleased with WorldWide Distributors since they shipped the phone free within one day and delivered it to my US address in four days. The only one issue I had is that when I tried to set up the phone for the first time, it failed to verify and gave me a message that the phone might be damaged; I tried many ways to get it working, including a hard restore back to manufacturer using iTunes, but I still get the same message. I reported this to WorldWide Distributors to request for a replacement, but four days after when I was about to ship it back, I gave it a final try and surprisingly it passed the verification and worked. I do not know what happened, but the phone was probably suffering from jet lag and needed few days to recover. I had my old iPhone 3GS easily backed up to iTunes and restored to my new iPhone 4S, and I started using my new phone in no time. I am very pleased with this purchase, except for the minor inconvenience of getting it to work the first time.

Therefore, I just filled up a return form and arranged by Amazon website with UPS tracking #.  Everything was set and my money was back in a couple of days.

But well, I thought it was only that. For my surprise, my phone fell so I took it to the Apple Store here in Barcelona, to the specialist, and after a minute looking at it he told me he couldn't do anything for me because the phone was FAKE, the screen was not as bright, the finishes were not equal, the screws were not the same, but that it really was a good imitation. Im totally disappointed, I had to buy a new phone... It really worked as an iphone, I can tell because I had other iphones before... So take care.

Reviews.Content: I get the phone in good condition which is important and will love, the downside is that they sent me black and locked even when the publication told me it was white and unlocked, I think that's why I do not place discontent 5 stars ..

Reviews.Title: The best phone I ever owned
Reviews.Author: Stefcia
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I ever had. I bought mine right from Apple. It has not crashed once, its flawless to me. I'm no tech geek, but I have no complaints. Coming from Droid, I dunno why It took me so long.You will not be disappointed!
